name: PalaTin
description:
Dragons are cute, but hard to feed. What should you do if your little dragons ask for "paladins" as dinner?

Don't worry, PalaTin is here!

In this game you will make the most popular dragon canned food PalaTin, from materials to delivery! 

How fast you can make a PalaTin?

------------------------------------------------------------

Control: Mouse and keyboard, follow the instruction in game
